name: soy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 a type of small bean grown in large amounts as food for people and animals: What makes soy so versatile? You might want to try soy-based protein bars. Soy flour is available in natural foods stores. a soy latte (= a milky coffee made from soy milk) See also
soybean
soy milk
soy sauce
More examplesFewer examplesIntroducing soy early in life may help children develop healthy eating patterns that last a lifetime.Non-dairy frozen desserts are made from soy milk or soy yogurt.Faux meat products are a great source of soy protein.
